Description: Comprehensive system for managing medical billing codes including ICD-10, CPT, HCPCS, NDC, LOINC, and custom codes. Enables search, import, validation, and lifecycle management of all code types used in benefit design and claims processing.
Enable Benefits Managers to search, filter, and browse medical codes with real-time search capabilities. Includes pagination, statistics, and code details display with support for 50,000+ codes.
Bulk import medical codes from CSV/Excel files with validation and error handling. Export codes for external systems integration and reporting. Supports CMS code updates and custom code management.
Create and manage organization-specific custom codes with prefixes, versioning, and approval workflows. Enables payers to define proprietary codes for internal benefit structures.

Manage HEDIS, MIPS, and custom quality measures with value sets, measure logic, and product linkages. Supports quality reporting, measure configuration, and code-to-measure associations for Star Ratings and quality programs.
Browse, search, and view HEDIS quality measures with detailed specifications, value sets, and measure logic. Includes denominator, numerator, and exclusion criteria for all HEDIS measures.
Configure and edit measure logic including denominator, numerator, and exclusion criteria. Define value sets and code associations for custom quality measures.
Link quality measures to health plan products to track measure applicability and compliance. Supports product-specific measure configurations and overrides.

Map medical codes to benefit segments and establish code equivalencies across different coding systems (CPT ↔ LOINC ↔ SNOMED). Enables benefit design, claims processing, and cross-system data integration.
Create and manage mappings between medical codes and benefit segments. Define copays, coinsurance, deductibles, and coverage rules for each code-to-benefit mapping.
Establish equivalency relationships between codes across different coding systems. Supports deduplication, cross-system integration, and EMR data normalization.
Perform bulk code-to-benefit mappings with validation, conflict detection, and rollback capabilities. Enables efficient mapping of large code sets to benefit structures.
Manage code collections (value sets) used in quality measures, benefit definitions, and clinical protocols. Supports VSAC integration, custom value sets, and code versioning.
Create, read, update, and delete value sets with associated codes. Manage value set metadata, purpose, and effective dates.
Add and remove codes from value sets with validation and conflict detection. Support multiple code types within a single value set.
Manage health plan products including Medicare Advantage, Medicaid, Commercial, and Exchange plans. Define product metadata, benefit packages, and compliance requirements.
Create, read, update, and delete health plan products with full lifecycle management. Includes product versioning, status workflows, and audit trails.
Display product statistics, metrics, and analytics. Track product status, benefit coverage, and compliance indicators.
Comprehensive analytics dashboards for code coverage, mapping completeness, quality measure performance, and system usage. Supports executive reporting and operational insights.
Real-time analytics dashboard with key metrics, trends, and alerts. Includes coverage rates, mapping statistics, and system health indicators.
Interactive charts and visualizations with drill-down capabilities, filters, and export functionality. Supports multiple chart types and data sources.
Intuitive navigation, responsive design, and user-friendly interface across all platform features. Ensures accessibility, performance, and modern UX patterns.
Sidebar navigation, page routing, and breadcrumbs for seamless user experience. Includes active state management and keyboard navigation support.
Mobile and tablet support with responsive layouts, touch interactions, and adaptive components. Ensures usability across all device sizes.
Non-functional requirements including performance optimization, error handling, accessibility, and system reliability. Ensures enterprise-grade quality standards.
Page load performance, API response times, and frontend optimization. Target: < 3s page load, < 500ms API response.
Graceful error handling, user-friendly error messages, and system resilience. Includes retry logic, fallbacks, and error boundaries.
WCAG 2.1 AA compliance for all user interfaces. Includes keyboard navigation, screen reader support, and color contrast requirements.
